meanings.definition: Give back money to (someone) in return for goods or services.
meanings.sent1: I will refund your money for the broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The store will refund your purchase if you return it within 30 days.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to refund the disappearing coin but it never came back.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness refunded my faith in humanity.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's smile refunded the student's confidence in math.

meanings.definition: An amount of money that is returned to someone who has paid too much for something.
meanings.sent1: She received a refund for the overcharged item.
meanings.sent2: The company issued a refund for the faulty product.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected refund made her day brighter.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a refund for her sadness.
meanings.sent5: The refund was like a ray of sunshine on a rainy day.
